predicate.note: Frames file for 'shape' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class build-26.1; other framed members include build, develop, grow, make.

role.descr: end state, if different from arg1

example.name: transitive
example.text: While the earnings picture confuses, observers say the major forces expected *trace* to shape the industry in the coming year are clearer.

example.name: with end state
example.text: John's experiences in grad school shaped him into a bitter old man.

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: The year was already shaping up as a difficult one for the recreational vehicle industry, which makes products such as motor homes, travel trailers, folding campers and van conversions.
example.arg: a difficult one for the recreational vehicle industry, which makes products such as motor homes, travel trailers, folding campers and van conversions

example.name: oh grow up!
example.text: John needs *trace* to shape up if he's not to be kicked out of school.
